data.content:
Danh từ
sự chọc thủng (hàng phòng ngự của địch)
bước quan trọng, phát minh quan trọng (trong khoa học...)
a major breakthrough in cancer research
một phát minh quan trọng trong việc nghiên cứu bệnh ung thư
breakthrough in negotiations
một bước tiến quan trọng trong thương lượng

noun
plural - throughs
[count] a sudden increase in knowledge, understanding, etc. :an important discovery that happens after trying for a long time to understand or explain something
Researchers say they have made/achieved a major breakthrough in cancer treatment.
a scientific breakthrough
The police have announced a breakthrough in the murder case. - sometimes used before another noun
breakthrough ideas/products
a person's first important success
This job could be the breakthrough she's been waiting for. - sometimes used before another noun
a breakthrough performance/role/album - see also break through at 1break
